definition: heavy load/heavy burden (also fig. of tax)
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
as if relieved from a burden (idiom)/to have a weight off one's mind

sentences.english: It was with immense relief that just before 1am we finally chugged back into life.
sentences.chinese: 在凌晨1點之前火車終於開了，我們如釋重負。

sentences.english: Sewage systems continue to overflow, forcing many beaches to close.
sentences.chinese: 污水系統仍舊不堪重負，導致許多湖灘被迫關閉。

sentences.english: I have a sense of completion.
sentences.chinese: 我有一總如釋重負的感覺。

sentences.english: When Japan occupied Nanjing, they were relieved and went back home.
sentences.chinese: 當日軍佔領南京的時候，他們才如釋重負並回到家裏。

sentences.english: My waders and fishing gear weighed me down .
sentences.chinese: 我的高筒防水靴和釣魚工具使我不堪重負。

sentences.english: We will make continued innovation on the way to rehabilitate overloaded rivers and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 繼續創新讓不堪重負的江河湖海休養生息的有效途徑。

sentences.english: What goes through the mind of the CEO isn't just about money and power. It also is about the burden of failure.
sentences.chinese: CEO腦子裏想的可不只是錢和權，還有失敗的重負。

sentences.english: Today we will look at the results of slogging through life under that extra weight.
sentences.chinese: 結果今天我們將看到在不必要的重負下生活舉步維艱。

sentences.english: Finally midnight arrived, he breathed a sigh of relief and went home.
sentences.chinese: 終於午夜到了，他如釋重負地長舒了一口氣回家了。

sentences.english: Hearing the news, he breathed a sigh of relief.
sentences.chinese: 一聽到消息，他如釋重負地鬆了口氣。

sentences.english: Gaia's movement will however aid in breaking the already burdened back of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 蓋亞的運動將有助於打破那已經不堪重負的經濟。

sentences.english: That is quite a millstone to carry in a knowledge-based economy.
sentences.chinese: 這可真是一個知識經濟時代的沉重負擔。

sentences.english: I heard her every stressed-out whimper my groaning triggered.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到了每一個她因爲我的呻吟而不堪重負的嗚咽聲。

sentences.english: The world's poor will bear the heaviest burden of climate change.
sentences.chinese: 全世界的窮人將承擔氣候變化的最沉重負擔。

sentences.english: And we are truly overloaded by data.
sentences.chinese: 我們對數據的確是不堪重負。
